title: FDC3 Agent Event Message
description: A message from a Desktop Agent to an FDC3-enabled app representing an event.

type.title: Message Type
type.description: Identifies the type of the message and it is typically set to the FDC3 function name that the message relates to, e.g. 'findIntent', with 'Response' appended.

payload.title: Agent Event Message Payload
payload.description: The message payload contains details of the event that the app is being notified about.

meta.title: Agent Event Message Metadata
meta.description: Metadata for messages sent by a Desktop Agent to an App notifying it of an event.
